summary: Tile cache should be at least as big as the number of tiles displayed

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Select the Cloudmade (small tiles) map mode 2. 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Once the tiles are loaded they should continue to be displayed. Instead a few tiles flash on and off. This is because the number of tiles needed is more than the cache size.
This issue was closed by revision r137.
